name: Football Card World Cup
description:
Football Card World Cup is a card game with enthralling gameplay you can enjoy alone or with friends.
Select the team and play against the best national football teams. Win the World Football Cup in this offline game.

KEY FEATURES:

• play offline
• simple and fun gameplay
• 66 different national teams from all over the world
• offline world championship
• 6 unique skills

Will you win the World Cup?

WIN THE WORLD CUP
Play against the different national teams in the world championship. Work your way through all of your opponents and be the champion!

FCWC has a simple gameplay and it is fun to play! Compete with your opponents and improve your scores by playing card soccer offline!
You can also play against your friend on the same device offline!
Show off your style and defend your nation’s colors!

Don’t miss out on this chance to have tons of fun!
